title: Satyajit Ray: creative artist of India
creator_contributor_role: Indian Government Information Service, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Appreciation

People/Motion picture producers and directors - Biography
description: A behind-the-camera portrait of one of the world's greatest film makers. Ray himself provides the commentary, in which he talks of his development as a writer and director. In particular, he develops the theme that through the medium of film he has not only reached a greater understanding of his own country, but has also found a greater universal understanding. Illustrated by scenes from The Apu Trilogy.
